text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/genomicstudy-changetype defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
DNA DNA changeChange that involves Deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) sequences.
RNA RNA changeChange that involves Ribonucleic Acid (RNA) sequences.
AA Protein/amino Acids change Change that involves Amino Acid (AA) or protein sequences.
CHR Chromosomal changesChange that involves number or strcture of chromosomes.
CNV Copy number variationsChange that involves copy number variations among various genomes.

name: GenomicStudyChangeType
title: Genomic Study Change Type
description: The change type relevant to GenomicStudy analysis.

concept.definition: Change that involves Deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) sequences.
Change that involves Ribonucleic Acid (RNA) sequences.
Change that involves Amino Acid (AA) or protein sequences.
Change that involves number or strcture of chromosomes.
Change that involves copy number variations among various genomes.
